column5: My daughter & I went lookin for muskies on Stoney Lake yesterday and I was trolling a 13" Believer in 25 FOW @ 5 MPH and I saw a hump coming up to 7' on the GPS screen, so I  told Sheri to get ready cause muskies luv to hang out around humps, and I no sooner said it and WHAM....the big girl hit right on cue  !!!!!  I grabbed the rod outta the holder, turned to the back of the boat and a big fat 50"er comes flying outta the water 30' behind the boat, does a tail walk and spits the bait right back at me........DANG    Doncha just hate  when that happens  .......
Oh man Lew...get's the heart rate right up there!!!
Dang that's a drag!  I would hate when that happens ... if I ever had a Muskie on my line  Maureen
I'd probably be laying on the bottom of the boat crying (after many choice words).   Knowing you Lew ... you'll go back and get her the next time.
Frustrating, but nice to know there hanging out there. Must be alot nicer having the lowrance onboard to get a better feel for the water.  Better luck next time bud.
Well, you know where he lives now Lew. I'd be shaking in my boots if I was that Musky.
It's a lot worse when it DOESNT happen! (as in nothing hits at all)
The fish sure were lure spitters this weekend!
Lew ya gotta lear the hooking program with them Beleivers well atleast this one stayed together.
Go get her next time Lew....
that must have been pretty exciting!  Cheers!
If that had ever happened to me, yes I think I would despise it immensely.

Man that's too bad but I'd still call that a successful day! (shows how easy I am to please) Those big ones are a pain in the butt to land and unhook is how I look at it, I'm just happy to see them.   p.s. shallow eye or deep eye?
YAHOO !!!!!...Hang in there Lew...I'm sure you'll get her next time...her days are numbered now that you are on her trail...
Can't honestly say that I hate it when that happens 'cause I've never had a 50" Musky spit my lure 30' behind the boat Sounds heart stopping!
Theres two of us Mike  Whopper
You've got his name, number and address Lew, I think you'll be back up there at some point and will nail him.
Sheri's the one that was really disappointed, cause I was just about to pass the fish'n pole  to her when the big girl said "see ya later"  Oh well, we'll get her next time......

Wow Lew I would have paid to see that.Too bad Sheri missed out .Better luck next time .You should keep a video camera at the stern filming so we can see a hit next time.Good Luck on your next adventure.  MTP
Ya win some, ya lose some.  At least you got an address for the her.  Good luck next time.
well atleast you had some action.
I cant stand when that happens!!! You'll hear me complain for at least 2 hours and again on the way home. Not a pretty sight.lol
